title: 2 Quick Ways to Report Inappropriate Videos on YouTube

steps.title: Open the YouTube app.
steps.content: Open the YouTube app. This looks like a white play button in a red box. If you aren't already logged in, do so now. You must be logged into a YouTube account to report inappropriate content.

steps.title: Navigate to the video you want to report.
steps.content: Navigate to the video you want to report. You can use the search bar to find a specific video or enter a URL .

steps.title: Tap Report.
steps.content: Tap Report . This is below the YouTube handle; you may need to tap and drag the row of icons to see it. It's next to Save . [1] X Research source Alternatively, open the video in full-screen view, and then tap the three-dots icon at the bottom. Tap Report .

steps.title: Select a reason and tap Report.
steps.content: Select a reason and tap Report . If the video violates specific guidelines, you can select it here. Once you've chosen a reason, tap Report to confirm, and the video will be reported. You can report a video for: Sexual content Violent or repulsive content Hateful or abusive content Harassment or bullying Harmful or dangerous acts Misinformation Child abuse Promotes terrorism Spam or misleading Legal issue Captions issue

steps.title: Go to https://www.youtube.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.youtube.com/ in a web browser. You can use any browser. If you aren't already logged in , do so now. You must be logged into a YouTube account to report inappropriate content.

steps.title: Navigate to the video you want to report.
steps.content: Navigate to the video you want to report. You can use the search bar to find a specific video or enter a URL in the address bar.

steps.title: Click ••• .
steps.content: Click ••• . You can find this underneath the video, next to Clip . A pop-up window will open.

steps.title: Click Report.
steps.content: Click Report . This is the second option.

steps.title: Select a reason and click Report.
steps.content: Select a reason and click Report . If the video violates specific guidelines, you can select it here. Once you've chosen a reason, click Report to confirm. The video will be reported. You can report a video for: Sexual content Violent or repulsive content Hateful or abusive content Harassment or bullying Harmful or dangerous acts Misinformation Child abuse Promotes terrorism Spam or misleading Legal issue Captions issue
